summary: This bill, the Promoting Affordable Childcare for Everyone Act (PACE Act), aims to increase the affordability of childcare. It amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit fully refundable and increases the credit percentage.  It also increases the maximum amount that can be excluded from gross income for employer-provided dependent care assistance and includes inflation adjustments for these amounts, all effective for tax years beginning after December 31, 2025.
